Hace cosa de 1 mes, vino un periodista Italiano para hacer varias notas 
de la economía en Argentina, entre ellas una relacionada a los 
videojuegos. Se contactó con algunas personas de ADVA y le dimos una 
entrevista. Parece que salió la nota ya, y llegó esto.

Por favor, respondale quien realmente esté interesado y pueda proveerle 
juegos de la calidad que necesiten (aparentemente para retail - venta al 
público). Estas oportunidades son excelentes para poder sacar nuestros 
productos al exterior, pero a veces es mejor dejarlas pasar antes que 
quemarlas.


-------- Original Message --------
Subject: 	[international] proposal {01}
Date: 	Wed, 2 Jun 2004 15:18:09 +0200
From: 	arnaldo albini <arnaldo.albini@...>
To: 	international List Member <suribe@...>



Dear gentlemen,

the Italian Financial newspaper "Il Sole 24 Ore" of the 27^Th May 2004, 
report an article that describe the programs of commercial expansion of 
the Argentina’s Video-games Companies.

We are a team, composed of three persons, father and sons, we operate in 
the Home Entertainment market from a long time with a specific know how 
in video-games.

I would like to propose my name to build with you a collaboration, in 
case some of these Argentina’s Company intend open an Italian branch 
office and distribution.

The our experience is articulate as following:

    * marketing research
    * sales organisation
    * management organisation
    * public relation
    * logistic distribution: traditional specialisation dealers, whole
      sellers, Mass distribution, special editorial channels (magazines
      and publications)
    * good relation with the Public Body for the protection of the copy
      right’s laws
    * specialisation in home entertainment market

We thank you in advance and hope for your favourable replay

Best regards

Arnaldo Albini Colombo

Piazza Giuseppe Grandi 20

20135 MILANO - ITALY


--

Sebastián Uribe
